item.title: C# Spirograph Point Generators
item.description: Spirograph’s are cool. See here and here. I put together three ways to generate points for a Spirograph, first using a Brute Force straight generate the points, second using a Parallel.For and third using LINQ. Two important classes first. First is a static DoubleExtension class to help determine when two doubles are about equal: using System; namespace DC.SpiroGraph.Core { public static class DoubleExtension { public static bool AboutEqual(double x, double y) { double epsilon = Math.
